name: ArdsNorthDown/LA06/2025/0700/DC
description: The partial Discharge of condition 5 of planning approval LA06/2024/0118/F which states "No wind turbine shall become operational until a Bat Monitoring and Mitigation Plan (BMMP) has been submitted to and approved in writing by the Council. The BMMP shall adhere to the Guidance on Bat Surveys, Assessment & Mitigation for Onshore Wind Turbine Developments NIEA, Natural Environment Division, August 2021. The approved BMMP shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Council. The BMMP shall include the following: a) Details of the further automated acoustic monitoring of bat activity across the site post construction using appropriate methodology for a period of three years; b) Details of bat carcass searches at selected turbines using appropriate methodology for the appropriate recommended length; c) Details of appropriate weather monitoring; d) Details of the production of yearly monitoring reports to be submitted to the Council within 6 months of the end of each monitoring year; e) Provision for additional mitigation or contingency measures which may be deemed necessary depending on the results of the monitoring and which shall be implemented if instructed by the Council; f) Provision for review of the mitigation measures and the length of the monitoring plan. The further monitoring should follow the guidelines laid out in the response above."
address: Lands 336m SE of 152 Rubane Road, Kirkistown, Cloughey, BT22 1AX

name: ECU/ECU00006233
description: As part of Network demand, Scottish Hydro Electric Power Distribution Plc proposes to create a new 11Kva Over Headline spur in Ardroil, Isle of Lewis. This new line would consist of 2 new spans in total, for a length of approx. 120 Meters, teeing off the existing HV Line (Pole.219) The line would consist of 2 single poles and a total of 3 support stays. The pole heights are documented below and the overhead line design is shown on the attached plan. The final single pole No.2 will have a 25KVA Transformer installed on it and a section of underground Low Voltage cable then going from the base of the pole towards the development. (approx.30 mtrs) This cable installation will come under permitted development.
address: 11kV -ARDROIL

description: DNS Ref: CAS-03540-M8J8M5 - Construct and operate a wind farm of a maximum of seven wind turbines, each with a three-bladed rotor and a maximum height to blade tip of up to 180m and associated infrastructure including: - improvements to an existing access, - new and improved internal wind farm tracks, - crane pads, - turbine foundations, - underground power cables linking the turbines and the on-site substation, - temporary construction compounds, - laydown and storage areas, - grid connection infrastructure, on-site substation and control building together with construction enabling works, and 33 kV underground cable connection within the DNS application boundary. description: Demolition of the existing rear conservatory and front porch. Proposed erection of a single storey flat roof rear extension and a erection of a first-floor rear extension, new pitched roof dormer window and provision of a new pitched roof structure to the existing bay window to the south east elevation. Erection of 2no. new porches to the front door (south east) and to serve a new side door (north west) and removal of existing brick chimney stack, new roof covering of plain clay tiles along with the repositioning of a new photovoltaic (PV) array on the south west pitch following the removal of the existing to the south east elevation. New air source heat pump (ASHP) to the north eastern elevation and widening of the vehicular driveway including works to improve the existing rear (north west) concrete blockwork boundary wall.
address: Red Gables High Street Blagdon BS40 7TQ

name: Ealing/252765CONS
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans) and rewording condition, pursuant to planning permission reference 232588VAR (vary 204549FUL) dated 23/11/2023 for: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (approved plans), and condition 19 (plant, enclosure or other equipment) of planning permission ref: 204549FUL dated 06/07/2022 for: Extensions to existing public house (Use Class Sui Generis) and ancillary former stable building, with retention of public house use at ground floor and partial change of use to provide 9 self-contained residential units (Use Class C3), with associated internal and external alterations, kitchen extraction, cycle storage, and refuse storage. Variation seeks to regularise internal and external amendments/alterations including enhanced provision of photovoltaics to main roof; dry riser inlet; removal of chimney stack; removal of end section of exiting pub bar; addition of high-level slot window to the apartments main entrance lobby; extending pub kitchen area; window amendment to rear of stable house entryway elevation; updated design to terrace balustrading; introduction (or possible reinstatement) of window between two bay windows at first floor level (Carlyle Road) studio apartment (Unit 03); dismantled and rebuilt stable house roof; insertion of doors to the bin store and new pub entrance; alterations to extract duct height; alterations to stable house roof; retaining and refurbishing bay window to main stair; and provision of air source heat pump to stable house (out of borough)
address: Ealing Park Tavern 222 South Ealing Road Ealing W5 4RL

name: Ealing/252654VAR
description: Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no.2 (approved plans) and rewording condition, pursuant to planning permission reference 232588VAR (vary 204549FUL) dated 23/11/2023 for: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73.a) to vary condition 2 (approved plans), and condition 19 (plant, enclosure or other equipment) of planning permission ref: 204549FUL dated 06/07/2022 for: Extensions to existing public house (Use Class Sui Generis) and ancillary former stable building, with retention of public house use at ground floor and partial change of use to provide 9 self-contained residential units (Use Class C3), with associated internal and external alterations, kitchen extraction, cycle storage, and refuse storage. Variation seeks to regularise internal and external amendments/alterations including enhanced provision of photovoltaics to main roof; dry riser inlet; removal of chimney stack; removal of end section of exiting pub bar; addition of high-level slot window to the apartments main entrance lobby; extending pub kitchen area; window amendment to rear of stable house entryway elevation; updated design to terrace balustrading; introduction (or possible reinstatement) of window between two bay windows at first floor level (Carlyle Road) studio apartment (Unit 03); dismantled and rebuilt stable house roof; insertion of doors to the bin store and new pub entrance; alterations to extract duct height; alterations to stable house roof; retaining and refurbishing bay window to main stair; and provision of air source heat pump to stable house
address: Ealing Park Tavern 222 South Ealing Road Chiswick W5 4RL

Piers/columns previously shown as metal clad are now brick as existing; ? The extent of the darker cladding above the main entrance has been reduced slightly; ? name: Southwark/25/AP/1687
description: Details of condition 12 (Breeam Report And Post Construction Review) as required by planning permission ref. 21/AP/0960 dated 21/03/2022 for 'Minor material amendment to planning permission 19/AP/1173 (Construction of a seven storey extension to the rear (from ground to sixth floor- the ground floor being an under croft) and two additional storeys with terraces to the existing five storey building for the retention of A1 (retail) on the ground floor and increased B1 (office) floorspace on the upper floors to create a seven storey building across the footprint of the whole site.) Changes include: - Construction of a single storey extension at ground floor level to the rear; - New wall at ground floor level to the west and north elevation; - Raised cil level at 6th floor; - Fenestration changes, including additional windows to the east elevation at ground floor level; - Changes to the tower design, removal of glazed corner cube; - Revised plant configuration at roof level; - New staircore, lift overrun and smoke extract at roof level; - Areas at roof reserved for photovoltaics and green roof; - Creation of a new basement level to accommodate a new sprinkler tank/plant
address: 150-154 Borough High Street London Southwark SE1 1LB
